commit message: Better support is the fragment is not properly attached
Refactorized updateNotification and made it work more logically. Changed notification action in airplane mode.
Avoid detached fragment exception on mobile network chart
Fix ACRA bug 'IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState'
Fix Large icon ACRA bug : see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15642900/bad-notification-posted-from-package-couldnt-expand-remoteviews
